mapper.insert: insert into parkinglot( parkingLotID, parkingLotName, parkingLotLocationLongitude, parkingLotLocationLatitude, parkingLotAdress, parkingLotStartTime, parkingLotEndTime, parkingLotMaximumCapacity, ownerID, parkingLotGracePeriod, parkingLotPreResvationPeriod ) values ( #{parkingLotID}, #{parkingLotName}, #{parkingLotLocationLongitude}, #{parkingLotLocationLatitude}, #{parkingLotAdress}, #{parkingLotStartTime}, #{parkingLotEndTime}, #{parkingLotMaximumCapacity}, #{ownerID}, #{parkingLotGracePeriod}, #{parkingLotPreResvationPeriod} )
mapper.select: select parkingLotID, parkingLotName, parkingLotLocationLongitude, parkingLotLocationLatitude, parkingLotAdress, parkingLotStartTime, parkingLotEndTime, parkingLotMaximumCapacity, parkingLotGracePeriod, parkingLotPreResvationPeriod, parkingLotID from parkingLot where parkingLotAdress like CONCAT('%',#{cityName},'%')

select parkingLotID, parkingLotName, parkingLotLocationLongitude, parkingLotLocationLatitude, parkingLotAdress, parkingLotStartTime, parkingLotEndTime, parkingLotMaximumCapacity, ownerID, parkingLotGracePeriod, parkingLotPreResvationPeriod from parkingLot where parkingLotID = #{parkingLotID}
select parkinglotIP from parkingLot where parkingLotID = #{parkingLotID}

select parkingLotID, parkingLotName, parkingLotLocationLongitude, parkingLotLocationLatitude, parkingLotAdress, parkingLotStartTime, parkingLotEndTime, parkingLotMaximumCapacity, ownerID, parkingLotGracePeriod, parkingLotPreResvationPeriod from parkinglot where ownerId = #{ownerId}
